section.title: Stop Losing Leads While You're
section.description: Every missed call is a lost commission. See how Sawtic AI transforms real estate challenges into competitive advantages.

problems.title: Missed Calls During Showings
problems.description: You're showing a property but missing 5 other potential leads calling about different listings. By the time you call back, they've already contacted competitors.

problems.title: After-Hours Inquiries Ignored
problems.description: Properties get viewed on weekends and evenings, but your office is closed. Hot leads slip away because they can't reach anyone immediately.

problems.title: Lead Qualification Bottleneck
problems.description: You spend hours on unqualified leads while serious buyers can't get through. Time wasted on tire-kickers instead of genuine prospects.
problems.impact: 70% of time wasted on bad leads

problems.title: Language Barriers
problems.description: Dubai's diverse market speaks Arabic, English, and more. Missing opportunities because you can't communicate effectively with all prospects.

problems.title: Manual Booking Chaos
problems.description: Double bookings, missed appointments, and scheduling conflicts create unprofessional experiences that cost you repeat business and referrals.

solutions.title: Never Miss Another Lead
solutions.description: AI agent handles all incoming calls instantly while you focus on current clients. Every lead gets immediate, professional response.

solutions.title: 24/7 Professional Service
solutions.description: Your AI agent works around the clock, qualifying leads, providing property information, and booking viewings even at midnight.

solutions.title: Instant Lead Qualification
solutions.description: AI pre-screens every caller with intelligent questions, routing only qualified, ready-to-buy prospects to your phone.

solutions.title: Fluent Arabic & English
solutions.description: Communicate perfectly with all UAE prospects in their preferred language, expanding your market reach and closing more deals.

solutions.title: Smart Calendar Integration
solutions.description: Automatic viewing bookings synced with your calendar, with SMS confirmations and reminders to eliminate no-shows.
